column4: Description
A classic romantic musical thriller set in Paris featuring mistaken identities and a memorable soundtrack.
A remake of French Kiss, this romantic comedy follows a woman who falls for a thief while trying to win back her fiance.
India's longest-running detective series following CID officers solving complex criminal cases.
An allegorical psychological thriller exploring three human emotions through relationships, touching upon Maslow's hierarchy of needs.
A chaotic Punjabi wedding in Delhi brings together family secrets, romance, and cultural traditions in this ensemble drama.
A heartwarming story about friendship, love, and loss set in New York, revolving around a terminally ill man who brings joy to others.
Set in the 1970s, three young people with different ideologies navigate love and politics during India's Emergency period.
Three young men from different backgrounds get involved in politics and their lives intertwine in this multi-narrative political drama.
An Indian Gujarati language drama exploring family dynamics and cultural traditions.
The story of a deaf-blind girl and her relationship with her teacher who helps her overcome challenges and discover the world.
A supernatural thriller about a group of friends on a wildlife trip who encounter a mysterious man-eating tiger in a jungle.
A complex tale of love and infidelity exploring marital relationships and emotional connections between two married individuals.
A mystical love story spanning centuries about a Himalayan warrior and a Japanese woman, exploring themes of reincarnation.
Multiple interconnected stories of urban life, love, and relationships in Mumbai exploring loneliness and human connections.
A psychiatrist attempts to debunk the mystery of a haunted palace and a spirit possessing a woman.
The rags-to-riches story of an ambitious man who becomes one of India's biggest business tycoons.
A Kashmiri boy finds a gun and faces difficult choices amidst the conflict-ridden valley.
A long-running series depicting real-life crime cases and investigations based on true incidents.
A political thriller based on a Greek novel, exploring corruption and power struggles in a fictional Indian town.
Two people meet in three different cities over several years, exploring how their relationship evolves with time.
A man seeks revenge for his father's death and aims to take over the criminal underworld of his hometown.
Students at an elite school compete for the prestigious Student of the Year trophy amidst friendship and romance.
A mistaken lunchbox delivery leads to an unlikely friendship and romance between a lonely man and a neglected housewife in Mumbai.
A woman and man meet in Paris and fall in love, but their brief romance faces challenges when they return to India.
A charming romantic comedy exploring modern love and relationships with humor and heart.
A medical student embarks on a trekking trip where she falls for a carefree young man with big dreams.
A spoiled city boy follows a social activist to a village to win her back, discovering purpose along the way.
A shy Delhi girl goes on her honeymoon alone after her wedding is called off, discovering herself on a transformative journey.
Based on a true story, a salesman in Pakistan risks his life to expose a multinational corporation's unethical practices.
A group of misfits plan an elaborate heist by disguising themselves as a dance troupe in an international competition.
An alien questions religious beliefs and superstitions in India, leading to a satirical exploration of faith.
An adrenaline junkie lives life on the edge, indulging in dangerous stunts and elaborate heists for thrills.
A comedy of errors involving lookalikes and mistaken identities leading to chaos.
An ex-army officer dedicates himself to helping ordinary people and inspires a chain of good deeds across society.
A man falls for his fiancée's quirky sister who returns home after seven years, creating romantic complications.
A group of friends turn vigilantes to fight corruption, catching the attention of a determined cop.
Set in Varanasi, this poignant drama explores caste discrimination, love, loss, and redemption through interconnected stories.
A story about a man who loses his true identity in societal expectations until a past romance helps him rediscover himself.
A man's past life as a member of a crime family complicates his present-day romance in this action-packed love story.
A devout man embarks on a journey to take a mute Pakistani girl separated in India back to her homeland.
An action thriller exploring themes of revenge and redemption in contemporary India.
A remake of the 1983 classic about young love facing obstacles from family and society.
A lovable Punjabi man is sent to Goa where he falls in love and gets involved with Romanian mafia.
A free-spirited romance set in Paris exploring modern relationships without the fear of commitment or heartbreak.
Two brothers return home for their grandfather's birthday, confronting family secrets and personal revelations.
A Netflix series following the everyday adventures of a young urban couple navigating modern relationships.
A budding cinematographer seeks the help of a psychologist to overcome her past traumas and find emotional balance.
A gritty multi-narrative drama exposing the drug crisis in Punjab through interconnected stories of abuse victims and fighters.
An intelligence officer who can hack into surveillance systems uses his skills to track down a psychopath killing innocents.

column1: The Extraordinary Journey of the Fakir
column4: An Indian street magician travels to Paris seeking his father and gets caught in a series of misadventures across Europe.
A bioscope seller forms a bond with a young girl in this adaptation of Rabindranath Tagore's Kabuliwala set in present-day Kolkata.
A remake exploring forbidden love between people from different castes in rural Rajasthan.
A retelling of the Mahabharata epic from Duryodhana's perspective, exploring his motivations.
A medical student's blood spills on a tomb, causing him to be possessed by a spirit with a tragic past seeking justice.
A budding politician has devious plans to rise in the ranks until he develops an alter ego that interferes with his every crooked move.
An NIA agent nicknamed Wild Dog leads a covert mission to capture terrorists behind bomb blasts across India.
A small-time thief breaks into a car and gets trapped inside with a mysterious figure controlling his fate in this first Telugu survival thriller.
Based on the life of Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan who was martyred during the 2008 Mumbai attacks, depicting his personal and professional journey.
Set in 1990s Telangana during the Naxalite movement, a young woman pursues her love for a Naxal leader inspired by his revolutionary poetry.
The inspiring story of ISRO scientist Nambi Narayanan who was falsely accused of espionage and his fight for justice.
A Netflix series about an honest IPS officer taking on organized crime in West Bengal.
Three young boys set out to capture India's most-wanted criminal but encounter a child trafficking ring and a journalist.
A fantasy drama exploring themes of life, death, and second chances with spiritual undertones.
A carefree young man gets caught up in local political disputes after falling for a medical student in this action-packed romantic comedy.
A Telugu romantic drama exploring modern relationships and emotional connections.
An exiled RAW agent is brought back to stop a massive terrorist attack planned by a former agent turned rogue.
A contemporary drama exploring urban conflicts and personal relationships in modern India.
A heartfelt drama about life, relationships, and finding meaning in everyday struggles.
A gripping political thriller following an Indian diplomat navigating international intrigue.
A modern adaptation exploring the world of high-stakes jewel theft and cat-and-mouse games.
A regional drama exploring family bonds and traditional values in contemporary settings.
A supernatural thriller exploring ancient curses and modern-day consequences.
A series of mysterious murders with occult symbols leads investigators into a dark conspiracy.
A nostalgic romantic story inspired by the classic Bollywood era of music and love.
An atheist man falls for the daughter of his father's arch-rival, a devout Hindu leader, exploring love beyond beliefs.
Three doppelgängers become friends via an app, but one turns out to be a notorious criminal with sinister plans.
A lighthearted comedy-drama set in rural Andhra Pradesh dealing with friendship and local life.
An aspiring cricketer makes a dangerous bet to pay for his father's surgery and gets caught in a crime web when the bookie cheats him.
A contemporary romantic drama exploring modern relationships and societal expectations.
A contemporary drama exploring social issues and personal transformation in modern India.
A documentary series exploring the behind-the-scenes work of Bollywood's music bands and orchestras.
A biographical film about astronaut Rakesh Sharma, India's first man in space.
An action-packed drama exploring themes of loyalty, pride, and community in North India.
A series exploring the lives of modern Indian royalty dealing with tradition and contemporary challenges.
Sequel to the hit film following honest tax officers conducting high-stakes raids on corrupt politicians.
Interconnected stories of urban life, exploring relationships and dreams in a bustling metropolis.
A chilling horror story about illusions, reality, and supernatural forces at play.
Based on true events inside Tihar Jail, exploring the lives of inmates and guards.
A geopolitical thriller following espionage and intelligence operations in the Middle East.
A series about housewives who accidentally become part of a drug cartel operation.
A film about India's Emergency period (1975-1977) and its impact on democracy.
An honest income tax officer suspended for his integrity conducts a dangerous raid on a corrupt politician, inspired by true events.
A woman is entrusted with an ancient relic connected to the mythical Fifth Veda, facing dark forces in her quest.
A comedy film exploring family dynamics and relationships with humor and heart.
After losing her army father, a writer and martial artist channels grief through writing, experiences love and heartbreak leading to personal transformation.
A middle-aged bachelor searching for love with specific qualities meets his ideal match, but faces opposition from her mother.
